mapper.select: select c.cglikeno, c.cgdowncno, c.cglike_cnt, up.cgupcgen, up.cgupclink, up.cgupcimg, down.cgdowncgen, down.cgdownclink, down.cgdowncimg from cglike as c, cgupcloth as up, cgdowncloth as down where c.cgupcno = up.cgupcno and c.cgdowncno = down.cgdowncno and cglikeno > 0

SELECT c.cglikeno, c.cgupcno, c.cgdowncno, c.cglike_cnt, up.cgupcimg, down.cgdowncimg FROM cglike AS c, cgupcloth AS up, cgdowncloth AS down WHERE c.cgupcno = up.cgupcno AND c.cgdowncno = down.cgdowncno AND cglikeno = #{cglikeno};
mapper.update: UPDATE cglike SET cglike_cnt = cglike_cnt + 1 WHERE cglikeno = #{cglikeno}
mapper.select: SELECT cglike_cnt FROM cglike where cglikeno = #{cglikeno}
